WorkItem.ClosedComment: I reworked the rotation code.Fixed in 35966.
WorkItem.Description:
I know Elem Shamans are currently buggy due to the lack of an elem dev available, but I thought I would point out something I noticed.
Â 
I noticed that when my mouse over my estimated DPS, it says that I am casting 125 lightning bolts a minute, and only 5.8 lava bursts per minute.  The ratio should be 11 LB : 2 LvB.  It is currently estimating around 43 LB : 2 LvB.  Clearly that is a huge error.

Comments.Message:
The error is not that big, since it only contributes to the number of casts per seconds responsible for procs.
This means, that proc trinkets might be overvalues a little bit because of that. The dps is calculated differently.
